Who_Can_Apply: Farmers with landholding up to 2 hectares.
Dependent wards of Ex-servicemen / Coast Guard.
Benefits: Scholarship up to Rs 3000 per month.

Description: Scholarship to prevent dropouts in class 8.
Who_Can_Apply: Students whose parental income is below Rs 3.5 Lakh.
Small business owners, shopkeepers, vegetable vendors.
Benefits: Loans up to Rs 10 Lakh (Shishu, Kishore, Tarun categories).
Bank loans between 10 Lakh and 1 Crore.

Description: Savings scheme for the girl child.
Who_Can_Apply: Parents of a girl child below 10 years of age.
Benefits: High interest rate (approx 8%) and tax benefits.

Who_Can_Apply: Families listed in SECC 2011 database (Low income).
Benefits: Free treatment up to Rs 5 Lakh per family per year.

Who_Can_Apply: EWS, LIG, and MIG income groups not owning a pucca house.
Benefits: Subsidy on home loan interest or financial assistance for construction.
